overview:
Lukas started his first business ventures at the age of 16 providing an online portal for schools in Switzerland called the Swiss Education Network. The revenue which came from selling advertising space was invested to establish Sensational AG which he co-founded with Philip Hofstetter and Martin Schlatter. This company has been on the market for 10 years and provides under the brand name of PopScan B2B e-commerce solutions processing over $400 million in revenue for it’s customers.

Lukas ist co-investor in runmyaccounts.com, a service for online accounting specialized to the Swiss market and co-founder of a new web service called TheHelpr.com which brings context sensitive online help to any website.
